name: Misuterii High
description:
As a spiritual sequel to "Mitadake High", Misuterii High is an anime-based roleplaying game in which a murder has occured in the titular school, automatically placing it under lockdown and trapping all the students in with the culprit.
Will they survive the night or will the killer claim them too? You decide.

Misuterii takes inspiration from numerous anime in the form of game modes, items, weapons and more.
The game includes the listed game modes; "Normal", "Death Note", "Umineko", "Shiki", "Madoka", "Tsukihime" and "Psycho Pass".
The game also includes support for custom modes using "Mystery Script". Please check the forums for more details.

If you would like to create a custom map for the game then please use the map editor, found here: http://www.byond.com/games/MetaFrosty/MisuteriiHighMapEditor

If you find a bug, please report it here: http://teambatfox.altervista.org/helpdesk/
Please refer to either MetaFrosty, Kamuna or AquanMagis for questions, or go to the forums.

Note: Any player is free to host their own servers and they have the right to decide the rules for it. If you get banned from someone's server, please contact them instead of complaining about it in the comments section.
